text: Hebe barkeri is a species of plant in the family Plantaginaceae. It is endemic to New Zealand. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * de Lange, P.J. 1998. Hebe barkeri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Hebe barkeri
